title: Chicago Casino Will Be Bally's In River West At Tribune Publishing Plant, Lightfoot Announces - Block Club Chicago
content:
1. Chicago Casino Will Be Bally's In River West At Tribune Publishing Plant, Lightfoot Announces  Block Club Chicago
  2. Chicago Mayor Lightfoot announces her pick to build city's first casino  Fox Business
  3. Mayor announces Bally's proposal to be Chicago's first casino  CBS Chicago
  4. It's official: Bally's casino in River West is Mayor Lori Lightfoot's pick for Chicago's gambling complex â€” but it's not a done deal yet  Chicago Tribune
  5. Lightfoot selects Bally's River West location for Chicago's first casino  WGN News
description: Neighboring alderpeople and resident groups have fought the casino, but Mayor Lori Lightfoot announced it as the winning pick Thursday. She still needs City Council and a state agency to sign off on the plan.
